Cloud computing Future

Recently cloud computing was considered the future, now that it is here, what would be the future of cloud computing.Years ago, when dial-up internet connections were the most spread solution all around in the world , the concept of software clearly implied a hard copy, CD or DVD that was meant to be installed on your PC and use the computers’ resources to provide that particular service or role. The average internet connection speed started to increase , broadband solutions expanded and costing decreased down utilizing a resource or service over the World Wide Web developed into complex business models. Names as Citrix was the first developers to come with complete and viable solutions for sharing services and solutions via internet, regardless of the hardware utilized by the end-user cloud computing .

Cloud computing-overview

Cloud computing is a method of using Internet technology and maintain all data and applications on remote server. Cloud computing allows businesses and consumers use application without their installation. You can access personal files without any installation of the software, only with the help of Internet access. The famous example of the cloud computing is gmail, yahoo, hot mail etc. Today, cloud computing is in a very rich in demand. All these sites you don't need to install any software, you can use them freely with just an Internet connection. The consumer easily use these service without any difficulty. Cloud computing is of three main types private cloud, private cloud, hybrid cloud. Public clouding is same as it name, it is available all over the Internet and anyone can managed from anywhere with the help of web interface. Private clouding is a clouding that is available within a network or over LAN and you have a limited access of the Internet. Hybrid clouding is a combination of the public and private cloud. Cloud computing can eliminate your stress. It can help you in many ways. You can search anything on Internet and it is beneficial for all peoples.

What is Public clouding?

Public computing is a process in which you can easily access Internet in all over the world. It is for all peoples all over the world. Today, many companies use cloud computing like IBM, DEL, HP etc.

What is private clouding?

Private is for within a network over LAN and in this category you can access a limited Internet service. Many companies use these clouding.

What is Hybrid clouding?

Hybrid is combination of public and private clouding. You can easily use this service all over the world or either within a network over LAN but in this category you can access a limited Internet access. In this way, cloud computing ready to make your journey in the world of Internet.

It is the easiest way of organizing information in different levels of departments. The services that are offered by cloud computingis actually a software but this software is not installed on your computer. This service is known as a software as a service or say SAAS. You can easily access this software through the Internet and provide database creation, provide storage, information management and other services that are related to businesses.
It is less expensive than the other software counterparts and the other reason is that they are the choice or many businesses and is very popular among many businesses.
